sentence.Network_en: This sort of punishment is applied only to nonviolent criminals who are not likely to be dangerous to the public.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种惩罚手段只适用于那些对公众不太可能形成危险的非施暴罪犯.

sentence.Network_en: Gandhi expounded the idea of nonviolent direction.
sentence.Network_cn: 甘地详细说明非暴力直接行动的思想.

We must meet violence with nonviolence ., 我们必须用非暴力来对付暴力.

entry.tran: (手段)非暴力的，不诉诸武力的
entry.def: Non-violent methods of bringing about change do not involve hurting people or causing damage.

example.ex: King was a worldwide symbol of non-violent protest against racial injustice...
example.tran: 金是全世界非暴力抗议种族不平等运动的象征。

example.ex: I would only belong to an environmental movement if it was explicitly non-violent.
example.tran: 我只会投身明确宣称采用非暴力手段的环境保护运动。

entry.tran: (犯罪等)不使用暴力的，不伤害他人的
entry.def: You can refer to someone or something such as a crime as non-violent when that person or thing does not hurt or injure people.

example.ex: The signs suggest that the elections will be non-violent and fair.
example.tran: 种种迹象表明选举将会是非暴力的、公正的。

means.word_mean: 1. abstaining (on principle) from the use of violence
